page.title: 17RECREATION STOKE ON TERN
page.content:
{THE SPORTS CENTRE}(con)
The Centre caters for anyone who wants to come along and enjoy themselves. Clubs use the facilities and they hold matches with other clubs.Also the hangar is used on occasion for County and National events. The life-style of today does not demand a person to take a lot of exercise. A centre such as this encourages people to stay fit and healthy. During the day Keep Fit sessions are held for housewives. These are very well attended. There is also a multi-gym for hire. This is a machine specially designed to develop all the different muscles of the body. A work-out on this apparatus has to be geared to a person's needs.
